Description:
A Beauty With Park Frontage
Proudly presenting this beautiful family home positioned right in front of an attractive tree lined park. Solidly built and offering a chance for one lucky buyer to grab a hold of something with attributes that are very hard to find. Ideal for those seeking a 3-bedroom home in good condition. Some of the features include:
- 3 bedrooms - master with 2 way bathroom and walk-in robe
- Entertainers kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances,40mm
stone benches with glass splashback.
- A large family/meals area.
- Nicely landscaped front & back garden with plenty of space.
- Remote controlled Double garage with internal access.
- Security alarm & cameras.
- Split air conditioning & ducted heating.
Conveniently situated in the best pocket of Cranbourne â?? literally 2 mins drive to hunt club shopping precinct, quality schools, parks, shops and public transport. To inspect and appreciate, call Vikram today on 0430392918.
Insights: 3 Hydra Street, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2019 and 165 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOME, WALK TO THE STATION!
Presenting a unique home in central Cranbourne set to impress home buyers & investors alike.
Set in a quiet court on a large 656sqm and boasting four bedrooms with the master featuring ensuite with spa, WIR and split system, wonderfully renovated kitchen with stainless appliances, two separate living zones, second family bathroom, split system heating/cooling plus gas heating & coonara, rear access to garage, and a spacious backyard with paved pergola to enjoy.
All this within walking distance to the station, buses, primary schools & shops. With such a prime location, this is an excellent investment in your future. Contact Daniel today before it's gone!
Please note: Photo I.D. required at all inspections

Description:
Unlimited Potential on Monahans
Introducing this charismatic home on a 650 SQM block which has been well maintained with Beautifully Landscaped gardens, Extra-large four car garage and extra high dual carport ensures you will have more than enough room for the caravan/boat and more with only a few minutes walk to Cranbourne West Primary School and Sandhurst Shopping Centre - you won't want to miss out.
With 3 Spacious bedrooms, Main bathroom equipped with a double shower and separate spa bath, 2 Separate Living areas; one being the Formal Lounge, Open plan living, kitchen and dining area, this home has a lot to offer.
Outside features a Water Tank, Solar power, separate garden shed and garden patch ready for all your green thumb needs - what more could you want.
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought-after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within a short distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park shopping complex, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
Insights: 64 Monahans Road, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 165 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
BRING YOUR TOOLS - GREAT LOCATION!
Located in the extremely sought after Sladen Park estate is this solid family home ready for some TLC. Within walking distance to Cranbourne Park shopping centre, schools, transport & parks, the home features 3 bedrooms with walk in robe and semi-ensuite to master, two spacious living areas including formal lounge and rumpus, central kitchen with gas cooking, family bathroom, timber floors, gas heating, coonara, double lock up garage & spacious yard. Suiting renovators, investors, and those handy with tools & a vision to unlock the endless potential. Set on a huge block of approx. 650sqm close to everything, inspection is a must, contact Daniel today!

RENOVATED BEAUTY!! NOT A CENT TO SPEND!! ON 591m2 BLOCK...

This amazing property features spacious master bedroom with a generous WIR which leads into a stunning ensuite.
The spacious gourmet kitchen features 600 electric cook top and 600 under bench oven with s/s canopy .
More features:
* Beautifully updated family bathroom.

* Modern freshly painted and new carpets throughout.
* New 2 x reverse cycle air-conditioning.

* Solid brick 4 car lock up garage with 15amp power
+ undercover parking for 2 cars.
* 7mx5m entertaining area with great back yard and beautifully landscape gardens.
Close to highly sought after Schools, shops, train station.
A short stroll to Shopping Centre's.
Inspection is a must don't miss out on this one.
For all enquiries please call John Lauretta.

Description:
EASY INVESTMENT, EASY TO ADD VALUE TO!
Ready to invest in & ready to make money on, this unit is WONDERFULLY CLOSE to Cranbourne train station and has a long-term tenant who is happy to stay.
Great 2 bedroom unit on a block of 3, it has a front lounge accompanied by an open kitchen-meals area that looks onto a pergola & good-sized back yard.
A single garage allows for secure storage for the car, and the property is only 150m from Cranbourne train station as well as being a walk away from Cranbourne Park Shopping complex.
Solid as a rock, the interior is perfectly serviceable, but with a small degree of imagination this property could return a huge amount of value with the right work done to it.
All of this with a reliable tenant, making it an easy decision for INVESTORS!

Description:
THIS IS THE ONE!! PRIME 744m2 CORNER POSTION!!
(217405) A great opportunity to purchase a solid property in an absolute prime location.
Located within walking distance to schools, shops, reserves, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and close to train station this 4 bedroom property on a massive 744m2 corner block with endless scope for future development potential (STCA).
The home features 4 bedrooms, two living areas including spacious lounge, family bathroom with projector and screen, high ceilings, gourmet kitchen S/S 600 upright oven, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, wood fired heater, surveillance system, 2.1m colour bond fencing,
secure electric gates , D/garage with side access to a great outdoor 12m x4m pergola with custom made blinds and landscaped gardens to be enjoyed.
It must be seen to be fully appreciated, and in this location such a quality property will not last long.
CALL JOHN TODAY.

Description:
Just 7 Years old 4 Bedroom Beauty
Spotlessly clean and beautifully presented, this 7 year old home still looks like brand new but with all the hard work done.
4 good sized bedrooms all have built in robes the master with walk in robe and full ensuite.
Big living areas include a separate formal lounge and a lovely well-appointed central kitchen with adjoining dinning and a large family/theatre room and of course these areas open onto a big alfresco area great for entertaining or casual family living.
Extras Include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roller shutters, double garage under roof line with remote door and internal plus rear roller door access.
Set in a lovely quiet court on a rectangular block this home will suit the fussiest of buyers.

Description:
Generous Living Inside and Out - 4 Bedrooms + Study
Perfectly located in Carlisle Park Estate, close to everything, this attractive 4 bedrooms plus study home offers spacious formal and informal living areas both inside and out.
With an enormous lounge/dining room with access onto the decked alfresco, modern kitchen with an island bench and stainless steel cooking, open plan meals area with timber floors and a large informal living room that opens out onto the decked enclosed alfresco, ideal for your indoor - outdoor entertaining.
Not to forget, all four bedrooms are big with robes, a full ensuite compliments the master, a large study off the entry, ducted heating and cooling, a double remote garage and a big backyard, all on an approximately 595m2 block.
All of this is within extremely close proximity to Coles Shopping Centre, cafes, take-away food, gym, schools, park, childcare, public transport, doctors and sporting grounds.
A spacious home in a fantastic location, come see for your-self.

Description:
"Fully Renovated Home"
Central 3 Bedroom home, all bedrooms with robes and split systems (large bedrooms) the master bedroom also has a full ensuite.
The kitchen has a stainless steel under bench oven , 2 x2 gas cooktop, double range hoods, splash backs great bench space and built in table plus room for a double fridge . 4 Split systems 3 with heating and fans to the bedrooms and one large heating and cooling unit, fibre to node NBN connected throughout at the highest speed and 5 kilowatt solar panels make sure the bills are extremely low.
This is a spacious home (vendors states 17Sq) on a 358M2 with top quality fixtures and fittings plus two alfresco areas and carport with storage, the location is perfect you can walk to the train station shops and schools you must inspect this home to fully reveal all the extra features it has to offer.
Inspections by appointment only Call Frank Barrett direct to arrange yours.
Quick settlement no problems.
WE ARE OPEN SUNDAYS

Description:
EXECUTORS AUCTION-MUST BE SOLD
Positioned on approximately 585sqm of land is this character filled family home that consists of endless opportunities. This property may suit anyone looking to remove & redevelop (STCA) or simply renovate the current dwelling to their liking.
The home features no less than 14 SOLAR PANELS, two living areas including lounge, dining area, a very modest family room and a beautiful timber kitchen equipped with loads of storage and bench space. Three good sized bedrooms, a main bathroom, outdoor BBQ area, wall furnace, a double carport & a long driveway to cater many more. The backyard has an abundance of plants including a garden shed, fruit trees & vegetables.
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Centro, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
SETTLEMENT 30/60 DAYS.

Description:
Love the location – 3 Separate Living Spaces!
Closing Date Sale - 1st December 2017 6pm (Unless Sold Prior).
Situated in the most sought after pocket of Cranbourne you are close to the renowned Carlisle primary and Courtenay gardens primary school (STSA). Also close to the wonderful amenities of Springhill Shopping Centre, child care centre, Merinda Park Railway Station, bus stops, Bunnings on Thompson road and easy access to south Gippsland highway. This ex display home is an absolute treat for families looking to live a relaxed lifestyle with plenty of room to wine and dine.
Sitting on approx. 560sqm2 land, this home offers:
? Master Bedroom with full ensuite and WIR.
? 2 other Bedrooms with BIR.
? Fully fitted open plan modern kitchen with stainless steel s appliances
? 3 separate living areas, including lounge, family room, and rumpus
? Spacious decked alfresco area to entertain family and friends.
? Low maintenance garden
? Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
? Large back yard and a double lock up garage.
? Spacious linen press
? Sky lights
? Security alarm

Description:
What a Fantastic Opportunity!
Being in one of Cranbourne's most Ideal spots this house will not let you down, with location, size and space at its finest this house will be gone quick.
Including everything a growing family needs, this home is situated on a approx. 620m2 block and has two separate living areas which includes a formal lounge and a family/meals area. All these features are overlooking a nice spacious kitchen, with plenty of cupboard space and bench space. Throughout the house you have ducted heating to keep you warm on those cold nights and a 7.1 Kw split aircon to keep you cool on those hot sunny days! Enjoy your sunny afternoons under a large alfresco area.
Comprising of four bedrooms , the master has full en-suite and walk in robe and the remaining bedrooms are nearby the central bathroom with a bath; this will be the first out of many things that blow you away. Other features include garage with rear access and side access to park additional cars , boat or a caravan. Premium 6.4 kw solar panels system with two storage batteries, water tank , fantastic landscaped gardens , ceiling fans , dishwasher , awnings, plus lots more.
Set in the perfect location with a family friendly neighbourhood you are just minutes away from all the local amenities, schools, shops, public transport and easy access to freeway this home ticks all the boxes.

Description:
Spacious Family Home
CLOSING DATE SALE: November 17th 6PM (Unless Sold Prior)
This 3 bedroom family home, located in a convenient area, close to the Springhill Shopping centre, parks, Carlisle primary school and easy access to public transport. This modern family home comes with 2 bath and 2 generous living areas, each bedroom has built in robes with a walk in robe and ensuite to the master featuring a corner Spa. The property boast of ducted heating, split system cooling, and gas stove tops, floating floor boards, large backyard with side access to trailer /boat/caravan. Double garage with roller door access to the back and plenty of space for kids and barbecues add further lifestyle benefits.
Looking for that well-proportioned, spacious family home? Look no further... Book an appointment now.

Description:
A piece of haven on 870m2 approx
Perfectly positioned in a quiet court sits this amazing opportunity that you will not want to pass up.
Boasting a fantastic family friendly floor plan with a centrally located kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and adjoining family/meals area, two additional living area and five bedrooms including a great size master with walk in robe and ensuite while the remaining bedrooms have built in robes.
Step outside through sliding doors to the fantastic outdoor undercover entertaining area with your own spa and generously sized backyard.
Adding to the fantastic layout is a central family bathroom, separate laundry and double car garage with internal access.
Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, extra split system, 20 solar panels and extra off street parking.
With all these great features this home won't wait around for long. Don't miss this opportunity. Call now to organise an inspection.
